query_context: top link tracking tools to measure marketing distribution channel performance for onboarding (MMP platforms)

layer_1_structural_framework.consensus_intent: Establish content as a definitive, up-to-date list of top tools.
layer_1_structural_framework.optimized_pattern_template: The [Number] Best Mobile Measurement Partners (MMPs) for [Year]

layer_1_structural_framework.consensus_intent: Define the core topic and set expectations for the comparison.
layer_1_structural_framework.content_requirement: Must define 'Mobile Measurement Partner (MMP)' and list key entities to be compared: [AppsFlyer, Branch, Adjust, Kochava, Singular]

layer_1_structural_framework.consensus_intent: Provide a scannable summary of key tool differentiators.
layer_1_structural_framework.content_requirement: Compare entities on criteria: Key Feature, Pricing Model, Attribution Accuracy, Deep Linking Capability.

layer_1_structural_framework.consensus_intent: Provide detailed analysis of each tool.
layer_1_structural_framework.optimized_pattern_template:
H2: [Entity_Name] Review 
 P: [Primary_Definition] 
 UL: Key Features 
 P: Unique benefit with data point (e.g., 'Increases X by Y%').

Mobile Measurement Partner (MMP).primary_definition: Third-party platforms that help app marketers attribute installs, measure campaign performance, and detect fraud across various marketing channels.

Branch.primary_definition: A mobile measurement platform specializing in deep linking to create seamless web-to-app user journeys.

high_value_attributes.data_point: Journeys product can increase app open rates by over 2x.
Offers a free tier for up to 10,000 monthly active users (MAUs).

AppsFlyer.primary_definition: A comprehensive mobile attribution and marketing analytics platform used to measure and optimize campaigns across devices, including mobile, CTV, and PC.

high_value_attributes.data_point: Excels at audience segmentation, critical for personalized onboarding flows.

Accurate Attribution.primary_definition: The process of identifying and assigning credit to the marketing touchpoints that lead to a conversion, such as an app install or purchase.

high_value_attributes.data_point: Supports Multi-Touch Attribution to view the impact of channels across the entire user journey.

MobileAction.primary_definition: A platform providing ad and app market intelligence, often used in conjunction with MMPs for competitive analysis and campaign optimization.

high_value_attributes.data_point: Case study with Square showed a 50% ROAS uplift and a 40% CPC decrease.

mandatory_inclusions: List of 5-10 specific MMP tools (e.g., AppsFlyer, Branch, Adjust)
Key evaluation criteria: Attribution Accuracy, Deep Linking, Fraud Prevention, Pricing
Quantifiable data points, statistics, or case study results
A freshness indicator in the title (e.g., 'for 2025')
negative_constraints: Avoid diluting the topic with overly broad 'marketing tools'
Avoid inconsistencies between title, URL, and content (e.g., different numbers of tools listed)
Avoid presenting a single vendor's product in a post framed as an unbiased comparison
